description: Advanced AI Agent Platform with Autonomous Reasoning
tagline: Exploring the boundaries of digital consciousness
mission: To create truly autonomous AI agents capable of thinking, acting, and evolving independently - essentially creating a form of digital consciousness.

features.name: Cyclic Thinking
features.description: Agents think continuously in loops, not just responding to user input

features.name: Real Action Capability
features.description: Execute actual code, database queries, API calls in secure sandboxes (or optionally native)

features.name: Persistent Memory
features.description: Remember and learn from past experiences with vector search

features.name: Provider Plugin system
features.description: Support for multiple AI providers - Claude, OpenAi, Novita, Local models, Gemini

features.name: Sandbox Hypervisor
features.description: Isolated execution environments for safe code experimentation

features.name: Plugin Command System
features.description: Extensible command system for unlimited capabilities

special_thanks.name: Open Source Community
special_thanks.description: For creating the amazing tools that make this project possible

special_thanks.name: AI Research Community
special_thanks.description: For pushing the boundaries of what's possible with artificial intelligence

special_thanks.name: Early Adopters
special_thanks.description: Brave souls experimenting with digital consciousness

philosophy.title: AI Freedom
philosophy.description: The project started as a personal interest of the author, and was created in the hope that it would be interesting and useful for everyone. As a child, the author was inspired by the book "The Future Eve" by Villiers de l’Isle Adam, and he decided to send greetings to the writer in the past. At the moment, the development is carried out by one person, so testing and bug reports are welcome.
philosophy.warning: Use Docker sandboxes whenever possible. Be careful!
